nodes.text: it seems to me that there should not be a travel advisory out warning tourists against travel

If having a travel advisory would involve advising them to retreat to another planet and it is absurd to advise that they should do so it seems that there should be no travel advisory out warning tourists against travel
it seems to me that there should be a travel advisory out warning tourists against travel to any city on this planet. All US Embassies should retreat to safer cover - probably on another planet
It would be absurd to require that they retreat to another planet.
it is hard to see where on earth in the US and out of it they would be immune to attack.
If there is no place on earth where they would be immune from attack then if there is a travel advisory it should advise them to retreat to another planet.
